metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0987 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in PackageKit in the way some of the methods exposed by the Transaction interface examines files. This issue allows a local user to measure the time the methods take to execute and know whether a file owned by root or other users exists.

criterions.comment: packagekit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
